column6: _Heat Engager from stance with Power Crush properties

column6: _Quick jab to start offense. Has extensions
_Mid poke. Has an extension to discourage retaliation
_Counterhit launcher that can also be used to pressure
_Low poke with good range and counterhit properties
_Risky low option that can knock opponents down
_Homing Attack to check sidestep. Can wallsplat
